review: I received my first Amazin Fire TV and set it up. It happened to get unplugged and when I plugged it back in, absolutely nothing happened. No lights, no engines whirring, nothing! It became a brick of uselessness. I spoke with Amazon customer service (who were extremely helpful and understanding) and was sent another box. Here is what peeved me.... I was sent a refurbished box that won't make it past the Amazon load screen. So this is two boxes now that have had inexplicable technical issues. I still need to contact Amazon about my second box... but I'm close to just asking for my money back.
author: K Staudt
